mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.xuesheng_kaoqin_id as xueshengKaoqinId ,a.xuesheng_kaoqin_list_types as xueshengKaoqinListTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,xuesheng.new_money as newMoney ,xuesheng.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail ,xueshengKaoqin.xuesheng_kaoqin_uuid_number as xueshengKaoqinUuidNumber ,xueshengKaoqin.xuesheng_kaoqin_name as xueshengKaoqinName ,xueshengKaoqin.xuesheng_kaoqin_types as xueshengKaoqinTypes ,xueshengKaoqin.xuesheng_kaoqin_content as xueshengKaoqinContent ,xueshengKaoqin.jiezhi_time as jiezhiTime
FROM xuesheng_kaoqin_list a left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id left JOIN xuesheng_kaoqin xueshengKaoqin ON a.xuesheng_kaoqin_id = xueshengKaoqin.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and ( a.xuesheng_kaoqin_id = #{params.xueshengKaoqinId} )
and a.xuesheng_kaoqin_list_types = #{params.xueshengKaoqinListTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and xuesheng.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
and xuesheng.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
and a.xuesheng_kaoqin_id IS NOT NULL
and xueshengKaoqin.xuesheng_kaoqin_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengKaoqinUuidNumber},'%')
and xueshengKaoqin.xuesheng_kaoqin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengKaoqinName},'%')
and xueshengKaoqin.xuesheng_kaoqin_types = #{params.xueshengKaoqinTypes}
and xueshengKaoqin.xuesheng_kaoqin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengKaoqinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xueshengKaoqin.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xueshengKaoqin.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xueshengKaoqin.jiezhi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jiezhiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xueshengKaoqin.jiezhi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jiezhiTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
